description: This file defines the TvShell widget, a Flutter widget tailored for TV interfaces. It sets up global shortcuts and focus traversal for remote control navigation, providing a scaffold with an app bar and safe area padding.

classes.name: TvShell
classes.description: A specialized Flutter widget providing TV-friendly navigation, focus management, and UI layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, setting up shortcuts, actions, focus traversal, and the scaffold layout.
